pageContext.claim: “Well, the ruling's basically starting all over again, sending everything back down to the lower courts and start all over again.”
pageContext.analysis: The Supreme Court's 7-2 rulings in the cases involving his tax records was a big defeat for Trump, as the court rejected his claim of "absolute immunity." It did mean his tax records would not become public before the election as further litigation will be required. But Trump had hoped the Supreme Court would have blocked the investigations completely.
